Field.Label: Every Kodi will send to Indigo what is happening (playing, pausing, stopping, navigating, etc).
So, Indigo must listen to the messages that come from the Kodi devices in your LAN.
To enable this "dialog", you must also install "Indigo Addon" in every Kodi.
When configuring the addon, you must indicate Indigo machine's IP address and this UDP port.
You must indicate a valid UDP port. This port must be free (not used by other process).
Indigo will use this port to receive the messages from your Kodi devices.
